text: adhkru 'iidh jawwkm min fawqikum mn aela alwadi min jihat almshrq, wamin 'asfal minkum min batan alwadi min jihat almghrb, wa'iidh shkhst al'absar min shdt alhayrt waldhsht, wabalaghat alqulub alhanajir min shdt alreb, wghlb alyas almnafqyn, wkthrt alaqawyl, watazunuwn biallah alznwn alsayiyat 'anah la yansur dynh, wala yely klmth
